prompts: Create a Pokemon that has a sleek design and sharp metallic features.
Imagine a dark-type Pokemon with a rebellious attitude and a penchant for stealth.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that wields blades and has a striking color scheme.
Generate a rugged-looking Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats.
Make a fighting-type Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a warrior and has fierce eyes.
Design a small Pokemon with a unique combination of red and black colors.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a knight, complete with armor and weapons.
